<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>false</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Adicionar Skill do colaborador">b5d506fbc32b2a104d7636dc0501317d</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>filtra apenas a rule colaborador logado</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
  // só aplica se for colaborador
  if (g_user.hasRole('x_snc_mock_skillup.colaborador')) {
    var q = 'email=' + (g_user.email || '').toLowerCase() + '^ativo=true';
    g_form.setReferenceQual('colaborador', q);
  }
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-03 12:51:47</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>be50b085c3bf22104d7636dc0501315a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>filtra apenas a rule colaborador logado</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value=" Mock SkillUp" source="x_snc_mock_skillup">389364c69f9322107f44bcf72024ab3f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value=" Mock SkillUp">389364c69f9322107f44bcf72024ab3f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_be50b085c3bf22104d7636dc0501315a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-03 12:58:42</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><va_supported>true</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
